data.actual_result: A prompt pops up asking to sync permissions or not (but you still can't add it to the category)
data.short_description: Prompt pops up when trying to add a lock voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server where you have the "Manage Channels" permission in your role - Have someone higher than you make a voice channel where only a role higher than you can connect - Create a category - Try to move the voice channel into the category
